contentList.content: Toggle the mod on/off without having to uninstall it.

Banter occurring within this distance in meters to your active character will be handled by the mod.
If not within this distance, the banter will repeat as in vanilla.
3m = ~10ft

-1 = banter can still repeat indefinitely, but will have different intervals from vanilla.
0 = banter will never repeat.
Any other number is the maximum number of times a banter can repeat.

How many seconds to delay the first banter repeat.
This helps alleviate the unknown time until the second occurrence.
Time in seconds to add to the interval between banter occurrences.

Maximum time in seconds to add to banter intervals.
Default is 5 minutes.
(-1 = will increase indefinitely with a square root function).

Enable or disable random intervals between banter occurrences.
If disabled, increases with a square root function.
Ignored if max interval bonus is -1.
Enable or disable distance-based scaling of the interval bonus.

Distance in meters where the maximum penalty is applied.
3m = ~10ft

Distance in meters beyond which the minimum penalty is applied.
3m = ~10ft

Factor by which the interval is multiplied at or below minimum distance.
(2.0 = double the interval).

Factor by which the interval is multiplied at or beyond maximum distance.
(1.0 = no change to the interval).

Time in seconds to reset intervals (-1 = never cleanup based on time).
Default is 60 minutes.
Does not persist on save/load
0 = no debug, 1 = basic debug, 2 = verbose debug.
Enabled
Minimum distance (meters)
Maximum occurrences
First silence step (seconds)
Minimum interval bonus (seconds)
Maximum interval bonus (seconds)
Use random intervals
Enable distance scaling
Minimum distance (meters)
Maximum distance (meters)
Minimum penalty factor
Maximum penalty factor
Cleanup on timer (seconds)
Debug level
